name: BacterioRage
description:
LudumDare #32 Submission

You're a tiny bacteriophage who is on a phage therapy* mission to fight off some icky bacterial infections. Your goal is to find the nucleus and replicate yourself (via insertion) in order to destroy the bacteria.

You are the weapon.

Controls
A/D: Move left and right
S: Inject yourself when on top of an enemy
Space: Jump

(Once Acquired)
Left-click: Fire
Shift: Dash



Credits
Music and Sound: Playonloop.com, Noiseforfun.com, and http://www.freesfx.co.uk

---
*Phage therapy or viral phage therapy is the therapeutic use of bacteriophages to treat pathogenic bacterial infections.
